text:
August 19, 1952
Mr, FrankSchooley
Box 23k
Deltaville, la.
Door Franks
Thank you very isuoh for your note of August 14th. The
telegram should have been sent to you in Virginia even
though Terry insists that you "aint receiving telegrams*â€™.
There is a majority vote for Harley, Merrill and Ludwig
in that order. There is a minority vote for Dunn, Rish worth
and Porter from Waldo Abbot. Allen Miller Joins with
Abbot.
1 have not heard from Dunn outside of his reaction to Wilbur's
letter.
Since there will not be a quorum at Abbs, it is not likely
t at formal action can be taken by the Board. 1 m inclined
to believe that we can reach the necessary conclusion by
the tine of lay return four weeks hence.
mth best wishes.
SKStLG
Seymour N. Siegel
